dialogue: I'm glad your project was transferred to my department, Ronald.
Your project is flashy! It's sexy!
But it's not worth funding because the revenue projections are puny.
Until something changes, you'll be in the limbo cube.
I'll trot you out whenever a customer or an executive visits.
You can show your sexy-flashy powerpoint slides while dreaming of being relevant.
If you work hard, someday you'll be totally forgotten.
Did you know that honesty makes people sad?
